languages.text: "Великий благослови и вас, и весь ваш род! Я бы не отказалась как следует отметить начало столь прекрасного сотрудничества!"

traits.locale_text: "Тогда нам стоит это отметить! Пойдем в "Крастоку-с-плеткой" или на ваш корабль?"

languages.text: "Exalted One bless you and your entire dynasty! I wouldn't say no to marking the occasion properly — it's not every day you embark on a brilliant new business partnership!"
languages.original_text: "Великий благослови и вас, и весь ваш род! Я бы не отказалась как следует отметить начало столь прекрасного сотрудничества!"

traits.locale_text: "Then we better go celebrate! To the Adeptus Amasecus or to your ship?"
"Then we better go celebrate! To the Adeptus Amasecus or to your ship?"
"Exalted One bless you and your entire dynasty! I wouldn't say no to marking the occasion properly — it's not every day you embark on a brilliant new business partnership!"
"Exalted One bless you and your entire dynasty! I wouldn't say no to marking the occasion properly — it's not every day you embark on a brilliant new business partnership!"
"Exalted One bless you and your entire dynasty! I wouldn't say no to marking the occasion properly — it's not every day you embark on a brilliant new business partnership!"

languages.text: “愿至高无上的神皇保佑你和你的王朝！这样的请求，我是绝对不会拒绝的。这么辉煌的商业合作，可不是每天都能碰得上！”
languages.original_text: "Exalted One bless you and your entire dynasty! I wouldn't say no to marking the occasion properly — it's not every day you embark on a brilliant new business partnership!"

traits.locale_text: “愿至高无上的神皇保佑你和你的王朝！这样的请求，我是绝对不会拒绝的。这么辉煌的商业合作，可不是每天都能碰得上！”

languages.text: «¡Que el Exaltado les bendiga a usted y a toda su dinastía! Jamás rechazaría celebrar la ocasión, ¡no todos los días se formaliza un acuerdo de negocios tan brillante!».
languages.original_text: "Exalted One bless you and your entire dynasty! I wouldn't say no to marking the occasion properly — it's not every day you embark on a brilliant new business partnership!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Que el Exaltado les bendiga a usted y a toda su dinastía! Jamás rechazaría celebrar la ocasión, ¡no todos los días se formaliza un acuerdo de negocios tan brillante!».

languages.text: 「エグザルテッド・ワン、あなたとあなたの王朝に祝福を！絶対に今日という日に印をつけるよ…素晴らしいビジネスパートナーが新たに出来るなんて毎日あることじゃないからね！」
languages.original_text: "Exalted One bless you and your entire dynasty! I wouldn't say no to marking the occasion properly — it's not every day you embark on a brilliant new business partnership!"

traits.locale_text: 「エグザルテッド・ワン、あなたとあなたの王朝に祝福を！絶対に今日という日に印をつけるよ…素晴らしいビジネスパートナーが新たに出来るなんて毎日あることじゃないからね！」

languages.text: "Der Erhabene segne Euch und Eure gesamte Dynastie! Ich werde den Anlass gebührend würdigen und nicht Nein sagen – man beginnt nicht jeden Tag eine prächtige neue Geschäftsbeziehung!"
languages.original_text: "Exalted One bless you and your entire dynasty! I wouldn't say no to marking the occasion properly — it's not every day you embark on a brilliant new business partnership!"

traits.locale_text: "Der Erhabene segne Euch und Eure gesamte Dynastie! Ich werde den Anlass gebührend würdigen und nicht Nein sagen – man beginnt nicht jeden Tag eine prächtige neue Geschäftsbeziehung!"

languages.text: « Que l'Exalté vous bénisse, vous et toute votre dynastie ! Vous savez, on pourrait fêter ça comme il se faut... Ce n'est pas tous les jours qu'on entame un nouveau partenariat commercial aussi brillant ! »
languages.original_text: "Exalted One bless you and your entire dynasty! I wouldn't say no to marking the occasion properly — it's not every day you embark on a brilliant new business partnership!"

traits.locale_text: « Que l'Exalté vous bénisse, vous et toute votre dynastie ! Vous savez, on pourrait fêter ça comme il se faut... Ce n'est pas tous les jours qu'on entame un nouveau partenariat commercial aussi brillant ! »

languages.text: "Görkemli seni ve tüm hanedanını kutsasın! Bu vesileyi doğru düzgün kutlamaya hayır demem. Senin gibi muhteşem ortaklar her gün bulunmuyor!"
languages.original_text: "Exalted One bless you and your entire dynasty! I wouldn't say no to marking the occasion properly — it's not every day you embark on a brilliant new business partnership!"

traits.locale_text: "Görkemli seni ve tüm hanedanını kutsasın! Bu vesileyi doğru düzgün kutlamaya hayır demem, her gün senin gibi muhteşem bir ortak bulunmuyor!"
